channel.title: Distributed-Systems on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed-Systems on Arrans github.io

item.title: seaweedfs/seaweedfs
item.description: SeaweedFS is a fast distributed storage system for blobs, objects, files, and data lake, for billions of files! Blob store has O(1) disk seek, cloud tiering. Filer supports Cloud Drive, xDC replication, Kubernetes, POSIX FUSE mount, S3 API, S3 Gateway, Hadoop, WebDAV, encryption, Erasure Coding. Enterprise version is at seaweedfs.com.

item.title: binhnguyennus/awesome-scalability
item.description: The Patterns of Scalable, Reliable, and Performant Large-Scale Systems

item.title: juicedata/juicefs
item.description: JuiceFS is a distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and S3.

item.title: git-bug/git-bug
item.description: Distributed, offline-first bug tracker embedded in git

item.title: spacedriveapp/spacedrive
item.description: Spacedrive is an open source cross-platform file explorer, powered by a virtual distributed filesystem written in Rust.

item.title: golemcloud/golem
item.description: Golem is an open source durable computing platform that makes it easy to build and deploy highly reliable distributed systems.

item.title: storj/storj
item.description: Ongoing Storj v3 development. Decentralized cloud object storage that is affordable, easy to use, private, and secure.

item.title: eProsima/Fast-DDS
item.description: The most complete DDS - Proven: Plenty of success cases. Looking for commercial support? Contact info@eprosima.com

item.title: ergo-services/ergo
item.description: An actor-based Framework with network transparency for creating event-driven architecture in Golang. Inspired by Erlang. Zero dependencies.

item.title: go-pluto/pluto
item.description: A distributed IMAP server based on Conflict-free Replicated Data Types.
